description:
Corey is a really big, tall guy!
“Hello!” he said in the deepest, manliest voice I’ve ever heard. “Nice to meet you.”
He reached his hand out to shake mine and it was like a vice!
“Wow, you’re strong!” I said. “And do you always talk in such a deep voice?”
He laughed. “Only when I’m trying to impress someone!”
For such an intimidating man he had a very warm smile, and I quickly realized that he had a soft side.
“Wow!” I said again as he took his shirt off. “You’re built too!”
And he was... big and ripped!
title: Corey
